verses.kjv: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: Moreover LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Now, thou son of man, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city? yea, thou shalt shew her all her abominations.
verses.web: “You, son of man, will you judge? Will you judge the bloody city? Then cause her to know all her abominations.
verses.ct: "Son of man, are you ready to pass judgment? Will you judge this blood-soaked city? Then confront her with every disgusting thing she has done.

verses.kjv: Then say thou, Thus saith the Lord GOD, The city sheddeth blood in the midst of it, that her time may come, and maketh idols against herself to defile herself.
verses.web: You shall say, ‘The Lord LORD says: “A city that sheds blood within herself, that her time may come, and that makes idols against herself to defile her!
verses.ct: Say to her, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: You are a city that murders your own people, bringing your day of reckoning closer. You make idols to defile yourself.

verses.kjv: Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen, and a mocking to all countries.
verses.web: You have become guilty in your blood that you have shed, and are defiled in your idols which you have made! You have caused your days to draw near, and have come even to your years. Therefore I have made you a reproach to the nations, and a mocking to all the countries.
verses.ct: The blood you've spilled has made you guilty, and the idols you've made have defiled you. You've brought your final days closer — your time has run out. That is why I've made you an object of disgrace among the nations and a laughingstock to every country.

verses.kjv: Those that be near, and those that be far from thee, shall mock thee, which art infamous and much vexed.
verses.web: Those who are near, and those who are far from you, will mock you, you infamous one, full of tumult.
verses.ct: Countries near and far will mock you, because your reputation is ruined and your city is full of chaos.

verses.kjv: Behold, the princes of Israel, every one were in thee to their power to shed blood.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Behold, the princes of Israel, everyone according to his power, have been in you to shed blood.
verses.ct: Look — every leader in Israel has used whatever power they had to shed blood within your walls.

verses.kjv: In thee have they set light by father and mother: in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger: in thee have they vexed the fatherless and the widow.
verses.web: In you have they treated father and mother with contempt. Among you they have oppressed the foreigner. In you they have wronged the fatherless and the widow.
verses.ct: Inside you, people treat their fathers and mothers with contempt. They oppress the foreigners living among them. They exploit orphans and widows.

verses.kjv: Thou hast despised mine holy things, and hast profaned my sabbaths.
verses.web: You have despised my holy things, and have profaned my Sabbaths.
verses.ct: You have despised my holy things and treated my Sabbaths as if they meant nothing.

verses.kjv: In thee are men that carry tales to shed blood: and in thee they eat upon the mountains: in the midst of thee they commit lewdness.
verses.web: Slanderous men have been in you to shed blood. In you they have eaten on the mountains. They have committed lewdness among you.
verses.ct: Slanderers live among you who spread lies to get people killed. Your people feast at pagan shrines on the mountains. They commit vile acts in your midst.

verses.kjv: In thee have they discovered their fathers’ nakedness: in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.
verses.web: In you have they uncovered their fathers’ nakedness. In you have they humbled her who was unclean in her impurity.
verses.ct: In you, men have slept with their fathers' wives. In you, men have forced themselves on women during their menstrual period.

verses.kjv: And one hath committed abomination with his neighbour’s wife; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter in law; and another in thee hath humbled his sister, his father’s daughter.
verses.web: One has committed abomination with his neighbor’s wife; and another has lewdly defiled his daughter-in-law. Another in you has humbled his sister, his father’s daughter.
verses.ct: One man commits a disgusting act with his neighbor's wife. Another defiles his own daughter-in-law. Still another violates his own sister — his father's daughter.

verses.kjv: In thee have they taken gifts to shed blood; thou hast taken usury and increase, and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbours by extortion, and hast forgotten me, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: In you have they taken bribes to shed blood. You have taken interest and increase, and you have greedily gained of your neighbors by oppression, and have forgotten me,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: In you, people accept bribes to murder. You charge interest and make profit off your neighbors through extortion. You have forgotten me, says the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Behold, therefore I have smitten mine hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made, and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Behold, therefore I have struck my hand at your dishonest gain which you have made, and at your blood which has been within you.
verses.ct: Now look — I am striking my fist against your dishonest profits and the blood that has been shed within you.

verses.kjv: Can thine heart endure, or can thine hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the LORD have spoken it, and will do it.
verses.web: Can your heart endure, or can your hands be strong, in the days that I will deal with you? I, LORD, have spoken it, and will do it.
verses.ct: Will your courage hold? Will your hands stay strong when I deal with you? I, the LORD, have spoken, and I will follow through.

verses.kjv: And I will scatter thee among the heathen, and disperse thee in the countries, and will consume thy filthiness out of thee.
verses.web: I will scatter you among the nations, and disperse you through the countries. I will consume your filthiness out of you.
verses.ct: I will scatter you among the nations and disperse you across foreign lands. I will burn the filth right out of you.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen, and thou shalt know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: You will be profaned in yourself, in the sight of the nations. Then you will know that I am LORD.” ’ ”
verses.ct: You will be degraded in full view of the nations. Then you will know that I am the LORD.'"

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, the house of Israel is to me become dross: all they are brass, and tin, and iron, and lead, in the midst of the furnace; they are even the dross of silver.
verses.web: “Son of man, the house of Israel has become dross to me. All of them are bronze, tin, iron, and lead in the middle of the furnace. They are the dross of silver.
verses.ct: "Son of man, the people of Israel have become worthless slag to me. They are nothing but bronze, tin, iron, and lead left over in a furnace — the waste that remains after silver is refined.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because ye are all become dross, behold, therefore I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem.
verses.web: Therefore the Lord LORD says: ‘Because you have all become dross, therefore, behold, I will gather you into the middle of Jerusalem.
verses.ct: So this is what the Lord GOD says: Because all of you have become slag, I am going to gather you together inside Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: As they gather silver, and brass, and iron, and lead, and tin, into the midst of the furnace, to blow the fire upon it, to melt it; so will I gather you in mine anger and in my fury, and I will leave you there, and melt you.
verses.web: As they gather silver, bronze, iron, lead, and tin into the middle of the furnace, to blow the fire on it, to melt it; so I will gather you in my anger and in my wrath, and I will lay you there, and melt you.
verses.ct: Just as a metalworker gathers silver, bronze, iron, lead, and tin into a furnace and blasts it with fire to melt it down, I will gather you in my fierce anger, throw you in, and melt you.

verses.kjv: Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you in the fire of my wrath, and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof.
verses.web: Yes, I will gather you, and blow on you with the fire of my wrath, and you will be melted in the middle of it.
verses.ct: I will pile you together and blast you with the fire of my wrath, and you will be melted down right there inside the city.

verses.kjv: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the LORD have poured out my fury upon you.
verses.web: As silver is melted in the middle of the furnace, so you will be melted in the middle of it; and you will know that I, LORD, have poured out my wrath on you.’ ”
verses.ct: Like silver melting in a furnace, you will melt inside Jerusalem. Then you will know that I, the LORD, have poured out my fury on you."

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, say unto her, Thou art the land that is not cleansed, nor rained upon in the day of indignation.
verses.web: “Son of man, tell her, ‘You are a land that is not cleansed, nor rained on in the day of indignation.’
verses.ct: "Son of man, say to the land, 'You are a country that has not been cleansed — a land that received no rain on the day of God's anger.'

verses.kjv: There is a conspiracy of her prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey; they have devoured souls; they have taken the treasure and precious things; they have made her many widows in the midst thereof.
verses.web: There is a conspiracy of her prophets within it, like a roaring lion ravening the prey. They have devoured souls. They take treasure and precious things. They have made many widows within it.
verses.ct: Her prophets have formed a conspiracy within her. Like roaring lions tearing apart their prey, they devour people. They seize treasure and valuables. They have created many widows within her walls.

verses.kjv: Her priests have violated my law, and have profaned mine holy things: they have put no difference between the holy and profane, neither have they shewed difference between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths, and I am profaned among them.
verses.web: Her priests have done violence to my law, and have profaned my holy things. They have made no distinction between the holy and the common, neither have they caused men to discern between the unclean and the clean, and have hidden their eyes from my Sabbaths. So I am profaned among them.
verses.ct: Her priests have violated my law and treated my holy things with contempt. They make no distinction between what is holy and what is common, and they don't teach people the difference between what is clean and what is unclean. They ignore my Sabbaths, and so my name is dishonored among them.

verses.kjv: Her princes in the midst thereof are like wolves ravening the prey, to shed blood, and to destroy souls, to get dishonest gain.
verses.web: Her princes within it are like wolves ravening the prey, to shed blood, and to destroy souls, that they may get dishonest gain.
verses.ct: Her officials are like wolves ripping apart their prey — shedding blood and destroying lives just to line their own pockets.

verses.kjv: And her prophets have daubed them with untempered morter, seeing vanity, and divining lies unto them, saying, Thus saith the Lord GOD, when the LORD hath not spoken.
verses.web: Her prophets have plastered for them with whitewash, seeing false visions, and divining lies to them, saying, ‘The Lord LORD says,’ when LORD has not spoken.
verses.ct: Her prophets cover it all up with whitewash, claiming to see visions and delivering false prophecies. They say, 'This is what the Lord GOD says,' when the LORD has said nothing of the sort.

verses.kjv: The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery, and have vexed the poor and needy: yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully.
verses.web: The people of the land have used oppression and exercised robbery. Yes, they have troubled the poor and needy, and have oppressed the foreigner wrongfully.
verses.ct: The common people practice oppression and robbery. They mistreat the poor and needy and exploit foreigners without any justification.

verses.kjv: And I sought for a man among them, that should make up the hedge, and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I should not destroy it: but I found none.
verses.web: “I sought for a man among them who would build up the wall and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I would not destroy it; but I found no one.
verses.ct: I searched for someone among them who would repair the wall and stand in the gap before me on behalf of the land, so I wouldn't have to destroy it — but I found no one.

verses.kjv: Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath: their own way have I recompensed upon their heads, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: Therefore I have poured out my indignation on them. I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath. I have brought their own way on their heads,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: So I have poured out my fury on them. I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath. I have brought the consequences of their own actions down on their heads," says the Lord GOD.
